short_summary: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3563169822 dated July 26, 2022 with a closing of September 1, 2022 at 2:00pm.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3563169822 dated July 26, 2022 with a closing of September 1, 2022 at 2:00pm. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.   \

 **Tender Notice**
---------------

**Title:** RFQ B - Audio Visual Boardroom Equipment

**Solicitation Reference Number:** WS3563125003-Doc3734617147

**Contract Status:** Cancelled

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of Audio Visual Boardroom Equipment in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply and delivery of Audio Visual Boardroom Equipment
* Option to purchase additional equipment
* Delivery date: February 1, 2023
* No security requirements associated with this requirement

**RFP Documents:**

* Annex A - Requirement
* Annex B - Basis of Payment

**Contact Information:**

Alexandra Nadeau, PSPC
alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Closing Date:** November 28, 2022 (amendment date)
Tender Closing Time: December 5, 2022 - 14:00:00hrs EST
